description:
The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Chikaratsuku! Oris Hiroba no Souryokusen!!
Luffy at the End of His Tether! An All-Out Battle at the Oris Plaza!
Luffy à bout de force ! Bataille générale sur la Place Oris !
Избиение Луффи! Масштабная битва на площади Орис!
بلوغ لوفي لحدود قوّته! معركة شاملة في ساحة أوريس!
ルフィ力尽く! オリス広場の総力戦!!
